H0.text: Liquids are the elements found to the right of the zigzag line in the periodic table.

H1.text: Metals are the elements found to the right of the zigzag line in the periodic table.

H2.text: Metals and gases are the elements found to the right of the zigzag line in the periodic table.

H3.text: Nonmetals and gases are the elements found to the right of the zigzag line in the periodic table.

A4.text: Elements to the upper right of the line display increasing nonmetallic behaviour.

A5.text: Elements to the lower left of the line generally display increasing metallic behaviour.
